summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Transportation and Infrastructure Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on September 16, 2024, at 1:00 PM. The meeting will take place in the Council Chambers on the 6th floor of City Hall and will also be accessible via video conference. The primary purpose is to discuss ongoing projects, legislative priorities, and updates related to transportation and infrastructure in Dallas.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the June 17, 2024, meeting.
2. Updates on the Dallas Love Field Master Plan.
3. Consideration of legislative priorities for 2025.
4. Progress report on digital kiosks within city rights-of-way.

**Important Details**:  
- The Dallas Love Field Master Plan update will be presented by the Director of the Department of Aviation.
- The Office of Governmental Affairs will propose legislative priorities for the upcoming year.
- An update on the implementation of digital kiosks will be provided by the Department of Planning and Development.
- Proposed amendments to the DFW International Airportâ€™s Code of Rules and Regulations will also be discussed.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and review the proposed legislative priorities for 2025. Additionally, they will consider amendments to the airport regulations and receive updates on the ongoing projects. The meeting will also include a forecast of upcoming agenda items for the September 25, 2024, City Council meeting.
